info.description: Interact with Skyrock.com features: blogs, profiles, messaging, 'what's new', friends & activities!
info.title: Skyrock

post.description: Sends a message to a single recipient.
Marks a message thread as read.

get.description: Returns a message thread (15 messages per page).
Returns the authenticated user's message threads (15 threads per page).
Returns descriptions of alerts types, for developer information.
Lists user's alerts (notifications).
Returns descriptions of events types, for developer information.
Lists events in the user's dash-board (eg. newsfeed).

parameters.description: Events category. Possible values: own (display own events), friends (display friends' events).
parameters.name: events_category

post.description: Sends a free text as alert to the authenticated user's alerts (notifications). The message is not localized and should be send in the user language. Unlike events, alerts are personal.

Sends a free text as event to the authenticated user's dash-board (eg. newsfeed). Events also appear in the dash-board of the user's friends. The message is not localized and should be send in the user language.

get.description: Returns an user last mood.
Returns an user's mood list.
Returns user profile's tags types.
Returns an user profile's tags.
Returns possible values for a given property. These properties can be set using set or set_config.

parameters.description: Property name. Possible values: gender, gender_preference, looks_for, status, town, country, department, occupation, place, personality, smoker, hair_color, eye_color, height, weight, block_friends, block_honors, block_groups, block_gifts, show_visits_counter, show_comments_counter, show_kiffs_counter, show_my_websites, show_mood, display_policy, allow_share, allow_facebook_like, allow_votes, allow_kiffs, default_page, show_me_page, show_news_page, show_photos_page, show_videos_page, allow_comments.
parameters.name: property

post.description: Sets informations about a profile's (see get_property_values for possible values to set).

get.description: Returns settings about current user's profile.
Returns a specified picture.
Returns the list of pictures associated with a profile.

post.description: Adds a picture to the profile.
Deletes an empty album. Main album (id_album = 1) cannot be deleted.

get.description: Returns the list of albums associated with a profile. Main album has id_album = 1.

post.description: Adds an album to the profile.
Sets an user's profile public data.

get.description: Returns an user's profile public data.

parameters.description: Defines which format to output, for specific rich text fields. Possible values: 'html' (default), 'bbcode'.
parameters.name: output_format

get.description: Returns the list of pictures from all blog's articles, paginated (35 pictures per page).
Returns available skins.
Returns a post's comment.
Lists a post's comments.

post.description: Associates media with a blog post.

get.description: Returns a post's medias list.
Returns an user's blog post. Only online posts will be returned, unless authenticated user is its creator.

parameters.description: Defines which format to output, for specific rich text fields. Possible values: 'html' (default), 'bbcode'.
parameters.name: output_format

get.description: Returns current user's blog posts list (offline only), paginated.

parameters.description: Allow authenticated blog owner to show secret posts (false by default).
parameters.name: with_secret

parameters.description: Defines which format to output, for specific rich text fields. Possible values: 'html' (default), 'bbcode'.
parameters.name: output_format

get.description: Returns an user's blog posts list (online only), paginated (10 articles per page).

parameters.description: Allow authenticated blog owner to show secret posts (false by default).
parameters.name: with_secret

parameters.description: Defines which format to output, for specific rich text fields. Possible values: 'html' (default), 'bbcode'.
parameters.name: output_format

post.description: Sets authenticated user's blog data. Each parameter is optional, you can either set one or many at once.

get.description: Returns a blog public data. If the call is authenticated and username is not provided, the method returns data about the current user's Skyrock blog.

parameters.description: Defines which format to output, for specific rich text fields. Possible values: 'html' (default), 'bbcode'.
parameters.name: output_format

get.description: List of user's groups.

post.description: Removes a user from the blacklist.
Adds a user to the blacklist.

get.description: List of users in blacklist.
Returns current user counters.
Checks friend relation between two users.
List of friend requests.

post.description: Removes a friend from the friend list.
Removes a friend from the best friend list. The friend user should be a best friend of current user.
Adds a friend to the best friend list. The friend user should be a friend of current user.

get.description: List of online friends.
List of best friends (paginated).

parameters.description:
Results order. Possible values:
- DEFAULT: default order.
- ALPHA: sort alphabetically.
- OLDEST_TO_NEWEST: sort by oldest to newest friends (by date of friendship).
- NEWEST_TO_OLDEST: sort by newest to oldest friends (by date of friendship).
- BEST_FIRST: default order, with best friends first.
- BEST_LAST: default order, with best friends last.
parameters.name: order

get.description: List of friends ids (paginated).

parameters.description:
Results order. Possible values:
- DEFAULT: default order.
- ALPHA: sort alphabetically.
- OLDEST_TO_NEWEST: sort by oldest to newest friends (by date of friendship).
- NEWEST_TO_OLDEST: sort by newest to oldest friends (by date of friendship).
- BEST_FIRST: default order, with best friends first.
- BEST_LAST: default order, with best friends last.
parameters.name: order

get.description: List of friends (paginated).

parameters.description:
Results order. Possible values:
- DEFAULT: default order.
- ALPHA: sort alphabetically.
- OLDEST_TO_NEWEST: sort by oldest to newest friends (by date of friendship).
- NEWEST_TO_OLDEST: sort by newest to oldest friends (by date of friendship).
- BEST_FIRST: default order, with best friends first.
- BEST_LAST: default order, with best friends last.
parameters.name: order

get.description: Returns an user's public data. If the call is authenticated and username is not provided, the method returns data about the current user's Skyrock account.
Returns the number of remaining queries (see http://en.skyrock.com/developer/documentation/api/#request-rate-limits). Calls to this method are not counted against the limits.
